channel.title: article. on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in article. on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-16
item.description: Samsung’s Galaxy A33 leaks in full before its ‘Awesome’ launch (3 minute read) Samsung is set to announce three devices at its Awesome Galaxy A Event this week.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-15
item.description: Microsoft releases DirectStorage: ‘a new era of fast load times and detailed worlds in PC games’ (3 minute read) Microsoft’s DirectStorage API has arrived for Windows.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-04
item.description: Netflix is launching a daily trivia series called Trivia Quest (2 minute read) Netflix’s new interactive series Trivia Quest will launch on April 1.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-28
item.description: Elon Musk activates Starlink satellite service in Ukraine after Vice PM calls upon him (2 minute read) Elon Musk activated Starlink’s satellite internet service in Ukraine after Mykhailo Fedorov, the Vice Prime Minister of Ukraine, tweeted at Musk asking for help.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-04
item.description: Samsung Galaxy A53 leak leaves little to the imagination with official-looking renders, specs (2 minute read) Details on Samsung’s upcoming Galaxy A53 have been leaked.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-05
item.description: Intel teases new technology to improve iPhone and Apple Watch integration with PCs (2 minute read) Intel’s next-generation Evo PCs may have iPhone and Apple Watch integration with iMessage support.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-24
item.description: Huawei enters China’s electric car race in competition with Tesla (3 minute read) Huawei recently released details on a vehicle with specs it claims beats Tesla’s Model Y.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-08
item.description: Cruise lays out its plan for ‘how’ it will make robotaxis a reality (7 minute read) GM’s self-driving subsidiary Cruise recently presented a roadmap for how the company will build autonomous vehicles that will be safer and more scalable than any human-driven vehicle.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-23
item.description: Facebook names a new CTO with a major focus on hardware (2 minute read) Facebook has promoted Andrew Bosworth, the current head of its hardware division, to the role of chief technology officer.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-14
item.description: Zoom is adding live translation services and coming to Facebook VR (2 minute read) Zoom plans to add real-time transcription for up to 30 languages and real-time translation across as many as 12 languages by the end of next year.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-05
item.description: TikTok confirms pilot test of TikTok Stories is now underway (3 minute read) TikTok is piloting a new feature called TikTok Stories.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-29
item.description: SpaceX is almost ready to start turning Starship’s launch tower into ‘Mechazilla’ (3 minute read) SpaceX plans to use a giant tower with arms to catch its rockets.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-12
item.description: Tesla finally releases Full Self-Driving Beta v9: here’s what it looks like (3 minute read) Tesla has released its Full Self-Driving Beta v9 update.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-08
item.description: Hacker shows what Tesla Full Self-Driving’s vision depth perception neural net can see (2 minute read) A hacker who managed to get root access to a Tesla vehicle has unveiled Tesla’s vision depth perception neural net.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-02
item.description: Google helps map one cubic millimeter of human brain tissue that comes in at 1.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-17
item.description: New leak ahead of Google I/O claims Android 12 may include changes for widgets and notifications (2 minute read) A new leak showing off Android 12 has appeared just before Google I/O.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-23
item.description: Apple’s HomePod mini reportedly has a secret temperature and humidity sensor (2 minute read) Apple’s HomePod mini smart speaker has a secret temperature and humidity sensor in its casing.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-10
item.description: Spotify are reportedly working on a new karaoke feature (1 minute read) Spotify is working on a Karaoke Mode that will feature lyrics and adjustable vocal levels for songs.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-31
item.description: Elon Musk shows Neuralink brain implant working in a pig (6 minute read) On Friday night, Elon Musk unveiled Gertrude, a pig with Neuralink’s wireless device surgically implanted in its skull.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-06
item.description: Samsung announces the Galaxy Z Fold 2 with bigger screens and better cameras (2 minute read) The new Galaxy Z fold 2 handset was officially announced at Samsung’s Unpacked event.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-30
item.description: Everything you need to know from the tech antitrust hearing (10 minute read) Jeff Bezos, Mark Zuckerberg, Tim Cook, and Sundar Pichai recently testified in Congress that their business practices don’t amount to anti-competitive monopolies.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-14
item.description: Google just put a photo of the Pixel 4A on its store (1 minute read) An image of Google’s Pixel 4A was mistakenly published on its Canadian store.
